summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1389, for the improvement of Eighth Avenue Northeast, in the City of Seattle, from East Sixty-fifth Street to East Fifty-fifth Street produced, by laying water mains of proper dimensions, together with all necessary gates, tees, and across necessary for the reasonable water service of said portion of said avenues, under Ordinance No. 15202, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
